website_summaries.verdict: This bracelet earns praise for its contemporary look and features, from the stainless steel construction to the sparkly crystals. But it does not fit everyone.
pros: Perfect for women who want a pretty look and a durable bangle-style bracelet that can be worn day or night for almost any occasion
Rose gold finish complements all skin tones
cons: It runs somewhat small and may not fit women with wrists larger than seven inches in diameter

customer_reviews.title: Great authentic bracelet.
customer_reviews.text: Bracelet arrived on time and in Michael Kors box. Purchased in February for girlfriend. She loves it and wears all the time. It closes and stays together with a magnet. Which is the only issue for me. I had to ship it to Michael Kors because it stopped staying closed. Easy warranty procedure and was replaced within a couple weeks. I would recommend this bracelet to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Charm keeps breaking and Gold is rusting!!
customer_reviews.text: 1st day the MK charm came off. I put it back on and tighten the hook. I’ve now had the bracelet for almost 2 months. The charm has popped off multiple times. The bracelet is tarnishing. I do not remove jewelry to wash my hands. This bracelet can’t handle water. Wayyyyy over priced!!! I wear Dogeared jewelry because it doesn’t tarnish. Don’t waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hill

customer_reviews.title: Simply Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I am am in love with this. Delicate, and simple. Nothing overly flashy, just sophisticated. I do not have small wrists, I would say medium, and this fits perfectly. I highly recommend!! Buy it, you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a replacement for my original one frommacys that I lost. The clip was always loose on it from the day I received it but I assumed that was just how the bracelet was made. I received this and the clip locks tight and I feel confident this one will not fall off. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves MK! Happy wife happy life!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Product was overnighted and arrived on time. The bracelet comes in a small MK bag and protected with plastic to prevent scratching. Very well made and looks great! My wife loves the gift and I would certainly recommend to anyone and I would purchase again from seller.
customer_reviews.author: nickm

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY BRACELET
customer_reviews.text: THIS BRACELET IS REALLY GOOD QUALITY AND HAS A NICE SNAP CLOSURE. LOOKS GOOD BY ITSELF ARE ADDED WITH OTHER BRACELETS.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni D

customer_reviews.title: Just My Luck
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality Michael Kors jewelry, this bracelet is beautiful. However, after three days the charm fell off and no jewerly store was able repair it. Overal,l the bracelet is really nice I just happen to get one with bad quality. I would be nice if the manufacturer would replace it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife she loved it. Rather than write a novel about the style and size - see the attached photos. Sorry about my construction worker hands. LoL
customer_reviews.author: dexburwell

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL! Picture does not do it justice
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL! Picture does not do it justice, its also very heavy and BLINGY! I have gotten so many compliments got it for Valentines Day, plus I received it the Saturday before Valentines. Definite a bracelet to wear all by itself I had to take off my others. You want be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia F Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Gold and bling, a girls best friend
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased another MK bracelet and it was too tight so I had to return it and I saw this one, love it. It looks like two bangles. It fits comfortably, the only thing is the clasp is a bit hard to open and close. You will love this, so pretty, I get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Daina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Wear it often and get compliments every tine. Clasp is easy to work with one hand and is heavy not too fragile. Will be ordering again for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The item looks just as good in person as it does online.
customer_reviews.author: MzNubyan Queen

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Super small. I purchased this for my mother who has a smaller wrist and it still was too small for her.
customer_reviews.author: Danni J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bracelet
customer_reviews.text: It’s so beautiful! Although it fits me perfectly because I have a very small wrist, it runs a little small. So if you have a larger wrist, I would not order because it will fit too snug!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis McCain

customer_reviews.title: it looks gorgeous on her wrist
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife, it looks gorgeous on her wrist, she liked it very much. I like the design, shape. It did not reach on time, but informed me for the delay. the screws are pretty tight.
customer_reviews.author: Shahidullah

customer_reviews.title: The bracelet is perfect size for my wrist
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet is perfect size for my wrist! This product is NOT for someone who has large wrist. Great piece of jewelry!
customer_reviews.author: Menya Montiel

customer_reviews.title: Broken easily
customer_reviews.text: The clip easily messed up and would be easily to replace it
customer_reviews.author: ramiraz

customer_reviews.title: CUTE AND MADE WELL
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bracelet, I stack it with my mk smart watch and it pairs so nicely with it! Very well made! VERY CUTE!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sebren

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this bracelet cause a stud fell off 😪 and I haven't had it for long How can I get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Desmond tate

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Love my new bracelet!! Goes perfect with my new watch !
customer_reviews.author: Christine hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Lacking Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not Impressed with the quality or look of this bracelet. The latch came broken and I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Puneet

customer_reviews.title: I got it for my Mother’s Day present from my ...
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my Mother’s Day present from my girls and it fell off so I bought another one because I didn’t want them to know and it fell off too. Lost both
customer_reviews.author: janet Ridaught

customer_reviews.title: He has nice Jewerly
customer_reviews.text: The item is too small i want a refund and the other item is the wrong nail drill
customer_reviews.author: Valaire W.

customer_reviews.title: I got one and I loved so much that I bought one for my mom
customer_reviews.text: I got one and I loved so much that I bought one for my mom. I lost mine, she lost hers, I got another one for me and I lost again. I’m so frustrated!!!! when you lean your arm somewhere the bracelet opens!
customer_reviews.author: Karinna Melino

customer_reviews.title: ... big for a female wrist but it is a great
customer_reviews.text: It is a little big for a female wrist but it is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Ralf Tafaj

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t really like the product.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic part came off. Not a good design, seems cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Marchilla

customer_reviews.title: Brownie points
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loved it. Hasn’t taken it off since I gave it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kessinger

customer_reviews.title: mk
customer_reviews.text: Solid bracelet. Take your time putting it on and off. My girl loves it.
customer_reviews.author: dml

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: got it as a gift, wife loves it. shes now is lookin for matching earings ;)
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this bracelet it is tarnishing.... do you stand behind this product?
customer_reviews.author: Carol Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have 3 other MK bangles and this fits right in perfectly with them!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: simple yet beautiful. It goes well with my watch and other ...
customer_reviews.text: simple yet beautiful .It goes well with my watch and other bangle.
customer_reviews.author: jonoka

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: Love it but the one I ordered from Macy’s came in a pretty case!!
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I brought this bracelet for my daughter she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: josette Blyden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like my bracelet, it just looked bigger in the picture than in rrality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the bracelet so far
customer_reviews.text: I love the bracelet so far. I've only worn it once since I got it but it's very nice. Going to look at another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just right bought it for my wife to ware on our wedding day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My girl loves the bracelet and was so surprised to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Lovely bracelet. Came in a nice soft keep sake bag. Very beautiful and classy looking. The Micheal Kors logo is engraved inside as well. Great buy 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s so pretty, it’s kind of hard to get off. But a great look
customer_reviews.author: MrsNebraska

customer_reviews.title: I love the Bracelet it is simply Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I love the Bracelet it is simply Gorgeous! But, I need it to be in a box it is a Christmas Gift! Can you send me a Michale Kors Box for my gift to my daughter!

feature_bullets: Accessorize from day to night in this shiny rose gold-tone stainless steel bracelet, complete with crystal embellishments and the Michael Kors logo.
